Desc.eng: Don’t get started with the theatrics!
Be careful. If you follow the corridor to the east, you'll find some arrogant cultists and their leader, who’ve been wreaking havoc around here.
I came to help you, old friend, but this strange lock looks unbreakable.
I’m no expert, but couldn’t you take the key from the Warden? Just an idea. He never leaves his guard post. It's on the northern corridor that leads from the Operating Theatre.
Why did they keep you here anyway?
When I was captured, Harker imprisoned me in this secret facility. He used my blood to recreate the Contrasolis Concoction!
A serum that protects the undead from the sunlight. A truly great notion if you want to build an army of vampires.
I have so many questions to ask you. But first let’s get you out here.
My friend! And I thought you had banished me to the sorrowful pits of despair for reasons that I can’t even…
